Title: workflow designer based on silverlight
Description:
a workflow designer developed in silverlight.
基于silverlight的工作流设计器
HomeWiki:
基于silverlight的工作流设计器 (a workflow designer developed in silverlight)

visit http://www.shareidea.net/opensource.htm?comefrom=codeplex for more information.

功能列表:(function list)

  • design workflow by drag-down
  • export to xml
  • import from xml
  • undo and redo
  • copy ,paste, align,
  • group select, group delete, group move
  • Ctrl+A/C/V/Z , Delete,Up,Down,Left,Right keyboard supportted
  • content menu
  • Zoom

在线演示(online demo )

http://www.shareidea.net/workflow.htm

视频教程(video)

http://www.shareidea.net/video/sharedesigner/sharedesigner.html

开发环境

vs2008+sp1,silverlight2.0,window xp(window2003以及silverlight3.0beta版本环境下有问题)
